title: Long for my Saviour I've been waiting

verses.text: Long for my Saviour I've been waiting, Long time have watched by night and day; Feared, lost my faith and hope debating, I shall never see the way.
Here in this vale of sin and sorrow, I have been wandering many years; Still looking for that happy morrow, When God would wipe away my tears.
Sometimes I fear my faith is failing, Pain then would lead my steps astray; But when the clouds begin to lower, Hope turns the darkness into day.
Oh! it will be but little longer, I must keep my courage still; Then let my faith and hope grow stronger, My Father's promise still is sure.

chorus.text: Jesus soon is coming; This is my song; Cheers the heart when joys depart, And foes are pressing strong.
